title: Sources of Team Conflict
content: Team conflict stems from various sources: resource competition, role ambiguity, communication failures, personality differences, competing priorities, and perceived unfairness. Identifying the source enables targeted resolution. Treating symptoms without addressing causes ensures recurrence.

mcq.question: Two team members are in frequent conflict. Investigation reveals they have overlapping, unclear responsibilities. What should be addressed?

options.B: The structural role ambiguity creating the conflict
options.D: They should work it out themselves

mcq.explanation: Structural causes produce predictable conflict regardless of individuals. Clarifying roles removes the source of friction. Focusing only on behavior treats symptoms while the cause continues generating problems.

openQuestions: What are the most common sources of conflict in your team?
Which conflicts stem from structure versus personality?
